name: Presidents and...
description:
In Presidents, you take on 3 computer opponents with the goal of playing all of your cards before the other players. The winner becomes the President of the next round, reaping the rewards of power (fewer cards, trades low cards for high cards). A player gets rid of their cards by taking turns playing them in hands like Singles, Doubles, Triples, Runs and Bombs. Gameplay includes "Clearing" or Twos and Bombs that let the player play any hand and skipping opponents.

Configurable options include four Opponent AI Difficulty Levels and an optional on-screen Helper, which makes only cards that the player can currently play selectable.

Develop your own strategy in this challenging game of luck and skill to hold onto your Presidency as long as possible or get back to the top. (Similar to games like Dai Hin Min and Rich Man)

For more information and a video demo, check out the official web site www.twistedinflux.com.
